p:
DNA corresponding to the human NLRP3 gene (NM_004895) was purchased from Origene (clone RC220952, Rockville, MD). Site-directed mutagenesis to generate NLRP3 harboring the rs7525979 variant ( NLRP3
979 ) was performed using the Stratagene QuikChange Kit (Agilent Technologies, Santa Clara, CA). Resulting constructs were sequence verified using standard techniques.
